beast.app
Class BEASTVersion

java.lang.Object
  beast.app.util.Version
      beast.app.BEASTVersion

public class BEASTVersion
extends Version

JOE NOTE: Forked from BEAST2 GitHub repo under GNU LGPL 2.1 Source: https://github.com/CompEvol/beast2/blob/master/src/beast/app/BEASTVersion.java Retrieved: 18 August 2015 :END NOTE This class provides a mechanism for returning the version number of the dr software. It relies on the administrator of the dr source using the module tagging system in CVS. The method getVersionString() will return the version of dr under the following condition:
1. the dr source has been checked out *by tag* before being packaged for distribution.

Author:
Alexei Drummond, Andrew Rambaut

 java.lang.String getVersion()
           
 java.lang.String getVersionString()
           
 double parseVersion(java.lang.String sVersion)
          Parse version string, assume it is of the form 1.2.3 returns version where each sub-version is divided by 100, so 2.0 -> return 2 2.1 return 2.01 2.2.3 return 2.0103 Letters are ignored, so 2.0.e -> 2.0 2.x.1 -> 2.0001

Returns:

parseVersion

public double parseVersion(java.lang.String sVersion)
Parse version string, assume it is of the form 1.2.3 returns version where each sub-version is divided by 100, so 2.0 -> return 2 2.1 return 2.01 2.2.3 return 2.0103 Letters are ignored, so 2.0.e -> 2.0 2.x.1 -> 2.0001

Returns:

formatVersion

public java.lang.String formatVersion(double version)
inverse of parseVersion
